title: SamDrivers 13.13 **anuJ
description:
Title : SamDrivers 13.13 - DVD Edition
Publication Type : Drivers with automatic installation
Purpose: A set of drivers for Windows x86/x64
Author : www.SamLab.ws / www.DriverOff.net
Release Date: December 1, 2013
Platform : Windows 2000/2003/XP/Vista/2008/7/8/8.1
Bit depth: 32 bits + 64 bits
Language: English/Russian and other languages
Tablet: Not required - free collection
System requirements : The presence of a pair of gigabytes of free space on the system hard drive to unpack temporary files

Description:
Collection of drivers from SamLab.ws for all 32 -bit and 64 -bit operating systems Windows, from Windows 2000 to Windows 8.1 Blue , including server platforms .
As the shell-installer to auto-detect your hardware and automatically install the necessary drivers use special programs :
DriverPack Solution Plus 13.0 Revision 399 / Drivers Installer Assistant 5.10.29 ( the ability to use version 4.0) / DriverX 3.05 ( ability to use after unpacking )
The collection includes the most current drivers on the release date collected personally SamLab. Do not confuse this package with the driver-packs Bashrat - these drivers are newer and more stable .
SamLab long been a member of the team Bashrat has the ability to know about all the problems that other driver packages to create your own set of the most comprehensive and peaceful !

NB: If a driver does not appear , showed up not chosen optimally : for any other questions and mistakes - do the following:
Create a report by running SysInfo.exe Root SamDrivers, a while to display the window to send the report or not: No click and spread the report here

Drivers for touchpads and other input devices of the driver packs DP_Touchpad_HHH install only under the personal supervision and only in the shell DPS
All of these devices have the same ID - monitor what put us on the touchpad in the title pack and laptop vendor in the folder name with driver
